terms.journal: A detailed log of every transaction, listed chronologically.
terms.ledger: A record summarizing all transactions by account.
terms.trial_balance: A summary showing that total debits equal total credits.
terms.debit: An entry that increases assets or expenses, or decreases liabilities.
terms.credit: An entry that increases liabilities or income, or decreases assets.

faq.q: How do I know my journal is balanced?
faq.a: The total of all debit entries must equal the total of all credit entries.
